description.full: FUJIKAWA , KANAGAWA ── Spring hereby comes again to Tourin Highschool, Fujikawa, Kanagawa.  [SERIZAWA NAOKI] hopes to remain still in the drowsy daylight after Golden Week.  "Change nothing, always remain still, this happy life…." This hope has not changed until NAOKI became 2nd grade of high-school.  「CHINATSU is NAO-kun’s wife!」 Childhood friend AMAKAWA CHINATSU who says this without shyness and friendly classmates are all he wanted to stay with.  ──But this hope is suddenly broken down by one mysterious girl── Mysterious girl NAGUMO KASUMI who came up suddenly and secret cohabiting life with her which also happened suddenly. "If you want to kick me out, go ahead. I will lose the residence and you will lose the future. Fair trade, isn't it?" Embarrassed NAOKI. Breaking down normal life.  Does he have a courage to unfold the linked fingers?
description.short: [SERIZAWA NAOKI] hopes to remain still in the drowsy daylight after Golden Week. This hope has not changed until NAOKI became 2nd grade of high-school. Mysterious girl NAGUMO KASUMI who came up suddenly and secret cohabiting life with her which also happened suddenly. "If you want to kick me out, go ahead. I will lose the residence and you will lose the future. Fair trade, isn’t it?" Embarrassed NAOKI. Breaking down normal life. Would he get a courage to cut this relationship?
